title: Disconnecting during a game
body:
I play on a Macbook Air El Capitan 10.11.6.

I always disconnect during a game within 5 minutes after it starts with no problem to my wifi network. Teammates suggested it is a server issue. 

Can I have some assistance?

replies.body:
These types of disconnections are often the result of the client not being able to maintain a solid link to the server. Since you're on WiFi, the first step I recommend is to bypass your wireless connection and try a wired (ethernet) connection to your modem. If you still see issues, I suggest working through the rest of the steps in our [connection guide for Mac.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#section-mac)

Let me know if those steps resulted in any change.
